    • Uses of ConnectionPoolException in b.connections

      Methods in b.connections that throw ConnectionPoolException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.closeAllConnections()
      this method closes all active connections.
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      this method is used to get an active and available connection out of the connection pool's set.
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      used to return the 1 instance of the ConnectionPool singleton, to allow access to it's other methods on the DAO level.
